name: Despondency
description:
Shoot your negative thoughts away in DESPONDENCY..!

Play inside the diary of a non-binary Person, who's struggling with their identity. Blast all the struggling thoughts and text passages away with your mighty rainbow gun! 

Every time you hit one of the snippets, you'll gain a new piece of clothing or hair in varying colors. You are colorful and bright and that's what's great about you! So don't let the negative thoughts win! 


This game was made in a timeframe of 36 hours as part of the bpb:game jam 2021.

Credits:

Nelli - Art
Birgit - Code 

Music :

"Stardust(Ziggy is coming")
By Kraftamt from http://dig.ccmixter.org/search?searchp=stardust%20ziggy

"German Industrial Metal" 
By Bogart VGM https://www.facebook.com/BogartVGM/

Sound-effects by PMSFX
